analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#84-85) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#182-218)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#297-320)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#391-405)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#409-426)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#491-495) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#231-249):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#246-247)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#247-248)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#522-537) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#532-534)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#458) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#495-502)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#491-495)
	- /unique_chucks/46/0x4a128beb9892142f131a6b3de4b31067c357a6d7.sol#492-494
